Text: Hur gör jag för att bränna ut den här filmen på dvd om man använder Nero?
To burn the DVD with Nero, choose "DVD-Video" as the Compilation Type, select all of the files from this Torrent, and burn the DVD.

Hi

Thanks for the download, great quality.

quick qst: when i want to make a DVD out of this - to play on DVD player connected to TV, do can i jus copy these files onto a DVD player, as in are they already encoded onto a dvd format. 

do i have to do ith with Nero using DVD-compilation, and what is the effect of doing it this way.

Also, in future if i want to download DVD movies what particualr file formats do i require if i want them to be burnt onto DVDs - here are so may movies out there - are ISO DVD suitable?

Hope someone can help

THANKS A LOT MAN!

APPRECIATE IT TOP QUALITY!!
Apart from the selectable subtitles there are English subs that cannot be turned off!!! Thanks for wasting my time.
*levdr* - umm, no, there are not hardcoded subtitles. Dunno how you burned it, but my burn has no subs unless you choose to turn them on.
